narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Vermont Department of Mental Health is a Clinic/Center  Adult Mental Health provider based in Burlington, VT. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $105.1M in Medicaid payments across 119K claims.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $105.1M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,143 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
